Posts.Content: mae232 wrote: Hi All, I got diagnosed with IDC and had MRI done with a result saying "there is a 2cm lymph node in the left axilla .metastatic lymph node cannot be excluded. I'm so scared with this result. I got my bone scan done today and will waiting for results. Surgery scheduled March 5. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: just got diagnosed with IDC and waiting for results mae232 Mamasha
